ADV3LITE VERSION 0.6

Thank you for your interest in adv3Lite, an alternative library for use with the TADS 3 Interactive Fiction authoring system.

To learn about using adv3Lite in your own work you can consult the Library Manual and/or the Tutorial. The Library Manual is useful as a reference for users who have completed (or who are working through) the Tutorial, or as a starting point for users who are already familiar with a similar IF authoring system, such as the adv3 library that comes as standard with TADS 3.

Existing users who have just downloaded this version of adv3Lite may wish to consult the Change Log. New or potential users may wish to begin with a fuller description of what adv3Lite is.
